image.alt: Friendly orthodontic team smiling in a bright treatment room at Leavitt Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Leavitt Orthodontics is a single-location, doctor‑led practice in Pocatello, Idaho, focused on providing comfortable, high‑quality orthodontic care in a family‑friendly environment. Dr. Leavitt combines modern orthodontic technology (digital 3D imaging and Invisalign/iTero workflows) with exceptional communication and community involvement to deliver efficient, individualized treatment plans that help patients feel confident in their smiles.

items.title: Personalized Care
items.text: One doctor, one location — Dr. Tyler Leavitt personally sees each patient and treats every family like part of his own.

items.title: Advanced Technology
items.text: Digital 3D imaging, iTero scanners and contemporary appliances (including Invisalign) for faster, more comfortable, precise care.

items.title: Flexible Financing
items.text: In‑office financing and flexible payment plans, including zero down options, to make treatment affordable.

items.title: Community Focus
items.text: Active involvement in local schools and community events, with clear, direct communication throughout treatment.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Tyler Leavitt was born in Pocatello and raised in Blackfoot, Idaho. He earned his Doctor of Dental Surgery at Creighton University, received multiple academic honors (including Summa Cum Laude, Alpha Sigma Nu and Omicron Kappa Upsilon), and completed his orthodontic residency at St. Louis University. He founded Leavitt Orthodontics to combine his passion for people and orthodontics and to provide individualized, confidence‑building smiles.

image.alt: Dr. Tyler Leavitt, orthodontist at Leavitt Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Invisalign, metal braces and retainers — treatment options tailored to your needs using modern digital workflows and proven orthodontic techniques.

og_meta.title: Home - Leavitt Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Leavitt Orthodontics provides personalized orthodontic care in Pocatello, ID, including Invisalign, metal braces, retainers, and flexible payment options.

image.alt: Leavitt Orthodontics team at the grand opening smiling in the office lobby

paragraphs.text: Leavitt Orthodontics is a doctor-driven, patient-centered practice where people come first. Our team is warm, respectful, and family friendly, focused on delivering thorough care with a personal touch.

We combine modern orthodontic technology with clear communication and attention to detail so treatment is comfortable, predictable, and fits each patient’s life. Dr. Leavitt personally reviews care at every visit.
We offer a full range of options, including Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and traditional braces, plus digital 3D imaging and iTero scanning to remove messy impressions and speed planning.
From flexible scheduling to transparent financial options, our goal is to make excellent orthodontic care accessible and enjoyable so patients leave confident to share their smiles.

image.alt: Dr. Tyler Leavitt smiling in the practice

paragraphs.text: Tyler Leavitt, DDS, MSD, is the founder and lead orthodontist at Leavitt Orthodontics. He created the practice to deliver high-quality, patient-focused care to his hometown community in southeastern Idaho.
Dr. Leavitt believes in a doctor-driven approach where he reviews each case personally and emphasizes clear communication so families understand their treatment plan from start to finish.

image.alt: Dr. Tyler Leavitt headshot

paragraphs.text: Dr. Leavitt earned his Doctor of Dental Surgery at Creighton University School of Dentistry and completed orthodontic residency training at St. Louis University Center for Advanced Dental Education.
During his training he received academic honors and awards recognizing both clinical skill and commitment to service.

image.alt: Dr. Leavitt in the clinic

paragraphs.text: Born in Pocatello and raised in Blackfoot, Idaho, Dr. Leavitt enjoys getting to know people, making them laugh, and treating patients like family. He’s passionate about helping people gain confidence through a great smile.
Outside of the office he stays involved in the local community and enjoys opportunities to give back through events and school outreach.

image.alt: Dr. Leavitt smiling and interacting with patients

paragraphs.text: At Leavitt Orthodontics, we’re proud to be part of the Pocatello community. We regularly visit local schools to teach oral health, sponsor youth sports and arts programs, host patient appreciation events, and donate to local charities to support families where it matters most.

og_meta.title: About Us | Leavitt Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Leavitt Orthodontics in Pocatello: our doctor-driven approach, community involvement, and services including Invisalign® and braces.

image.alt: Smiling family at orthodontic front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit starts with a free consultation where we listen to your goals, perform a thorough exam, and take any necessary X-rays. This gives us what we need to recommend treatment tailored to your smile.
At Leavitt Orthodontics we review your medical history, outline a personalized treatment plan, and explain insurance and payment options so you can decide with confidence.

image.alt: Parent and child at orthodontic reception

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file your claims electronically for maximum convenience.
Flexible payment plans are available, and our treatment coordinator will help you find an option that fits your budget.

image.alt: Family smiling together after orthodontic treatment at Leavitt Orthodontics

seo.page_description: Schedule a free consultation at Leavitt Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access patient forms, and schedule your appointment today.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, Pocatello, first visit, patient forms, Leavitt Orthodontics

og_meta.title: Get Started | Leavitt Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Schedule a free consultation at Leavitt Orthodontics. Learn what to expect on your first visit, access patient forms, and schedule your appointment today.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages at Leavitt Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Whether you’re considering braces or clear aligners, we’ll walk you through options and next steps so you leave with clarity and no pressure. Our team creates personalized plans that fit your life and goals.
Durable and cost-effective, metal braces use small brackets and wires to gradually move teeth into place with predictable results.

image.alt: Dental checkup with braces

paragraphs.text: Ceramic braces blend with tooth color for a subtler look while providing the same reliable tooth movement as traditional systems.

image.alt: Smiling woman with clear aligner
Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Damon-style bracket systems can reduce friction and help us guide tooth movement in a way that supports natural smile esthetics. Many patients appreciate the streamlined appointments and comfortable design.

image.alt: Patient smiling showing Damon braces

paragraphs.text: Metal braces remain a reliable choice for many patients. They are durable, effective for complex movements, and often the most cost-effective option.

image.alt: Pocatello braces example

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners are removable, discreet, and custom-made using advanced 3D planning. They let you keep your normal brushing and eating routines while your teeth move gradually and comfortably.
As certified providers, we use digital scans and careful monitoring to deliver predictable, efficient aligner treatment when it’s the right choice for you.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Retainers protect your investment by keeping teeth in their new positions while bone and soft tissue adapt. We design retention plans around your needs to maintain long-term stability.

image.alt: Young woman smiling and holding an orthodontic retainer

paragraphs.text: Essix retainers are clear, custom-fit appliances that are nearly invisible. They’re a popular removable option for protecting alignment with minimal visual impact.

image.alt: Clear Essix retainers in protective case

paragraphs.text: Bonded or fixed retainers are attached to the back of the teeth for long-term stability. They’re ideal when predictable retention is important, though they require extra attention to cleaning.

image.alt: Orthodontic patient with bonded retainer

paragraphs.text: We use modern digital tools like iTero scanning and 3D treatment planning to capture precise images and simulate results. That means fewer messy impressions and more accurate, comfortable care.
Fast, radiation-free scans capture precise 3D images for accurate treatment planning and aligner design.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in use during orthodontic consultation

paragraphs.text: Advanced software simulates each stage of tooth movement, giving you a virtual preview of your new smile.

image.alt: 3D treatment planning software showing orthodontic simulation
Modern dental office interior with advanced technology
Family smiling together after orthodontic treatment at Leavitt Orthodontics
